review: So far.....I have to say that the Fire TV Stick has been underwhelming. The selection of material available to view is more limited than I had hoped.Maybe I just need to spend more time using it.....I hope so. There are so many times watching the programming on TV that I end up watching the rotating circle indicating buffering and waiting for the program to start.....then I give up in frustration. Maybe I will just return it.
author: Andrew P

review: Bought this for my 70 year old Dad. Set up was very easy and he doesn't have and trouble navigating for use.I'm buying a second one for me!
author: Ajtshead3

review: I am loving my Amazon Firestick. It has already changed my viewing habits. I hope to make more changes. I am still making discoveries. Thank you.
author: Jeff Vellenga

review: It doesn't take the place of cable yet, but hopefully it will soon.  Last to use.  Great to travel with, better than paying for on demand while on the road.
author: zab

review: I cut off my cable and decided to get the Fire TV Stick and I'm so happy that I did. My whole family loves it!!!!
author: LaKeisha Madson

review: The Fire TV Stick worked as advertised but I was a little disappointed in the selection of free movies. I would prefer to pay an additional $200 annually for total selection of free movies. The Amazon price for movie rentals is higher than the Red Box movie rental service. As the weather gets better and I have a desire to rent a movie, at this point, I think that I will be using the Red Box movie rental service.
author: The old one

review: Nice product.  Like that it has categories to scroll through. Wish it had a few more current movies for free but that's almost goofy- 40,000 plus and I'm complaining.  No, not really.
author: zartiste
